statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Allen, Anthony lead Richmond past George Mason 75-65
article.headline: Allen, Anthony lead Richmond past George Mason 75-65
article.linkText: Allen, Anthony lead Richmond past George Mason 75-65
article.story: RICHMOND, Va. -- Kendall Anthony scored 20 points and Terry Allen added 19 to lead Richmond to a 75-65 win over George Mason on Thursday. T.J. Cline added 14 points for the Spiders (8-7, 1-1 Atlantic 10), who ended a three-game losing streak by racing to a 42-23 lead at the half. Richmond shot 68 percent before the break, hitting 6 of 9 3-pointers. Anthony had three treys and 11 points, combining with Allen for 24 points. Allen had seven and Anthony a 3 in a 13-0 run that made it 35-18 with 3:54 left in the half. Shevon Thompson had 19 points and 17 rebounds for George Mason (6-8, 1-1) and Patrick Holloway scored 17. The Patriots had a 36-19 rebounding advantaging, including 18-0 on the offensive end. That led to 17 more shots but couldn't overcome Richmond's hot hand that including a going 20 of 23 from the foul line.
